 package(default_visibility = ["//tensorflow:__subpackages__"])

body: @keveman is this right?  do CPU srcs also go in gpu_srcs?  I think youll end up using nvcc to compile your kernel, which may not be as fast.
body_html: @keveman is this right? do CPU srcs also go in gpu_srcs? I think youll end up using nvcc to compile your kernel, which may not be as fast.
